file_content.text: Getting a bit close for comfort, SCORPIO!
I am performing a feat that none of you could ever hope to. Not even you, with your amusing cranial trinkets.
Tora, have you jammed the ship's comms? Hello...? Tora?
Koth, have you jammed the ship's comms? Koth?
You know I did, Senya.
Almost to the hangar.
Ready to commandeer, Commander?
Did you really just say that?
Let it go, Theron.
I don't understand. Where are all of the Skytroopers?
Even a lesser version of me would be highly intelligent. She would certainly know how to improvise.
No point in waiting around. Let's get moving.
We can't sit here.
You're the GEMINI expert. What's our move?
Any suggestions?
We get it. You're special.
Get over yourself.
I must have touched a nerve. Imagine that.
I have determined that this will be the shortest route to the bridge.
I don't like this at all.
Neither do I, but we have little choice.
Uh, couldn't read you. This line's for intelligent questions only.
I suggest we step outside and see what happens.
What an amazing plan.
Yes, I quite like it, too.
